SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

Class BwProvisionerSimple

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.BwProvisioner
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.BwProvisionerSimple
public class BwProvisionerSimple extends BwProvisioner
BwProvisionerSimple is an extension of BwProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate bandwidth (bw) to VMs: if there is available bw on the host, it allocates; otherwise, it fails. Each host has to have its own instance of a RamProvisioner.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov

    • isSuitableForVm

      public boolean isSuitableForVm(Vm vm, long bw)
      Description copied from class: BwProvisioner
      Checks if it is possible to change the current allocated BW for the VM to a new amount, depending on the available BW.
      Specified by:
      isSuitableForVm in class BwProvisioner
      Parameters:
      vm - the vm to check if there is enough available BW on the host to change the VM allocated BW
      bw - the new total amount of BW for the VM.
      Returns:
      true, if is suitable for vm
